body:
Hey guys!
I created this topic, because many people asked that.
In avicus, nebula is the favorite game of the most of us.
Some people, reached prestige 5 and level 50, and it started to boring.
As some people said, reset stats isn't possible.
My idea, is make more nebula prestiges, till 10.
6th- dark blue
7th- cyan
8th- green (not lime)
9th- dark purple
10th- Black
I'm asking from the developers, to make this changes on the next update.
Leave upgrades/comment below.
~Eric

replies.body:
@D00ZiE: Most of people, as i said, their favorite game is nebula.
They loved that and played soooooooooooo much and reached prestige 5th and lvl 50.
They left nebula, and after that avicus.
We don't wanna lose people, plus- It will be more fun to play, reach more prestiges.
I thought about that, you are right.
Don't need any perfixes.
We need more prestiges.
Btw its not hard to get 10th because ou are already 5th, do like you did before.
Plus you can be 5th and lvl 50 and then just /prestige because you are already lvl 50.
It's good idea as many people saying.
You are level 50 and prestige 5, maybe it's not boring you to still play, but i'm sure it will be more fun to me, you and all the other avicus players to reach more xp.

replies.body:
+1 


I think this would make nebula more interesting.

Maybe there should also be a hidden objective once you reached the tenth prestige.

I'm sure the developers can do this. Just not sure if they have enough time.
I guess we might have to be more patient then.

Very good idea though. 
Maybe every year, as a celebration, more prestiges are added? Or else it will start all over again.
